SEARCH
Package com.lboric.soccerdnd.repositories

Interface PlayerStatsRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<PlayerStatsEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<PlayerStatsEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<PlayerStatsEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<PlayerStatsEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<PlayerStatsEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<PlayerStatsEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<PlayerStatsEntity,Long>
@Repository public interface PlayerStatsRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<PlayerStatsEntity,Long>
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on PlayerStatsEntity objects.

This repository extends JpaRepository to provide standard JPA operations for interacting with the PlayerStatsEntity database table. It also includes custom queries to fetch player statistics data and perform other operations related to player statistics.

  • Method Details

    • findAllPlayerStats

      @Query("SELECT new com.lboric.soccerdnd.dtos.PlayerStatsDTO(p.id, p.name, p.surname, ps.seasonYear, ps.numberOfGoals) FROM PlayerStatsEntity ps JOIN ps.player p") Optional<List<PlayerStatsDTO>> findAllPlayerStats()
      Retrieves the statistics for all players, converting them into PlayerStatsDTO.

      This query joins the PlayerStatsEntity with the PlayerEntity to fetch the player's statistics, including the player's ID, name, surname, season year, and the number of goals scored.

      Returns:
      an Optional containing a list of PlayerStatsDTO objects, or an empty Optional if no player statistics are found

    • findPlayerStatsById

      @Query("SELECT new com.lboric.soccerdnd.dtos.PlayerStatsDTO(p.id, p.name, p.surname, ps.seasonYear, ps.numberOfGoals) FROM PlayerStatsEntity ps JOIN ps.player p WHERE p.id = :playerId") Optional<PlayerStatsDTO> findPlayerStatsById(@Param("playerId") Long playerId)
      Retrieves the statistics for a specific player by their ID, converting the result into PlayerStatsDTO.

      This query fetches the statistics for the player with the given playerId, including their ID, name, surname, season year, and the number of goals scored.

      Parameters:
      playerId - the unique ID of the player whose statistics are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the PlayerStatsDTO of the player, or an empty Optional if no statistics are found for the player

    • findByPlayerAndSeasonYear

      @Query("SELECT ps FROM PlayerStatsEntity ps WHERE ps.player = :player AND ps.seasonYear = :seasonYear") Optional<PlayerStatsEntity> findByPlayerAndSeasonYear(@Param("player") PlayerEntity player, @Param("seasonYear") int seasonYear)
      Finds player statistics by the given player and season year.

      This query retrieves the statistics of a player in a particular season, identified by the player's entity and the season year.

      Parameters:
      player - the PlayerEntity representing the player whose statistics are being searched
      seasonYear - the season year for which the statistics are being retrieved
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the PlayerStatsEntity if the statistics exist, or an empty Optional if no statistics are found for the player in that season

    • deleteByNameAndSurnameAndSeasonYear

      @Modifying @Query("DELETE FROM PlayerStatsEntity ps WHERE ps.player.name = :name AND ps.player.surname = :surname AND ps.seasonYear = :seasonYear") void deleteByNameAndSurnameAndSeasonYear(@Param("name") String name, @Param("surname") String surname, @Param("seasonYear") int seasonYear)
      Deletes player statistics based on the player's name, surname, and season year.

      This query removes the player statistics for the player identified by their name, surname, and the specified season year.

      Parameters:
      name - the first name of the player
      surname - the last name of the player
      seasonYear - the season year of the statistics to be deleted
